comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Caption should be "House at Rheims." NYT of September 24, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60915FB3D5C13738... reports on devastation of and in the neighborhood of the cathedral.

comment._content: Thank you for your research swanq.  We'll make the correction to the caption and add some of the information the next time we update the record.
